channel.title: A client.java I made for people to start making their own source
channel.description:
Use this for a source start. I made it in about 2 hours from me to all of you. I hope this makes server building easier on some people.
{~~CREDITS~~} gr1m r3ea4r (i think that's his name) 10% for client.java file Me 89% for editing adding features and building most all of it and now releasing it to you all neo765 1% for helping add a few litle tweaks (barley anything) How do I make a client.java a virus I am saying that because I don't think you can. Enjoy :D

item.title: A client.java I made for people to start making their own source

item.description:
@guthan_software wrote:

Might I don’t think so. I remember making it compatible with most sources.

Read full topic
